title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\V2\MutateRowsRequest\Entry
name: Entry
description:
A mutation for a given row.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.v2.MutateRowsRequest.Entry

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.row_key
params.description: The key of the row to which the mutations should be applied.

params.name: data.mutations
params.description: Required. Changes to be atomically applied to the specified row. Mutations are applied in order, meaning that earlier mutations can be masked by later ones. You must specify at least one mutation.

methods.description:
